resources.string:
Welcome to Tiffin Counter app

 • Adding a Tiffin • Please set Lunch and Dinner tiffin prices before adding them.

 • Update a Tiffin Date • Click on Tiffin Date which you want to update date.

 • Update a Tiffin Price • Click on Tiffin Price which you want to update price.

 • Deleting a Tiffin • Long press Lunch/Dinner on the tiffin item which you want to delete.

 • Tiffin Analysis • Click the Info icon above in the toolbar and see various information about your tiffins.

I am Hasan Sajora and I have developed this app for my personal usage, you are free to use this app according to your need.

 • You can contact me at • 
 Email : sajorahasan@gmail.com
